metadata.description: Comprehensive global food additives database including E-numbers, processing aids, hidden ingredients, and contaminants

E104.name: Quinoline yellow
E104.concerns: May cause hyperactivity; banned in US

E124.name: Ponceau 4R
E124.concerns: May cause hyperactivity; banned in US

E161g.name: Canthaxanthin
E161g.concerns: Eye crystal deposits at high doses

E322.name: Lecithins
E322.concerns: May be GMO if from soy

E392.name: Rosemary extract
E392.concerns: May cause allergies in sensitive individuals

E472a.name: Acetic acid esters of mono- and diglycerides

E472b.name: Lactic acid esters of mono- and diglycerides

E472c.name: Citric acid esters of mono- and diglycerides
